verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,
Shall he that <S%H7378>contends<s%> with the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H3250>instruct<s%> <S%H3198>him<s%>? he that reproves <S%H433>God<s%>, let him answer <S%H6030>it<s%>.
Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,
<S%H7043>Behold<s%>, I am vile; what shall I <S%H7725>answer<s%> <S%H7760>you<s%>? I will lay my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H3926>upon<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
<S%H259>Once<s%> have I <S%H1696>spoken<s%>; but I will not <S%H6030>answer<s%>: <S%H8147>Yes<s%>, twice; but I will proceed no <S%H3254>further<s%>.
Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> unto <S%H347>Job<s%> out of the <S%H5591>whirlwind<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,
Dress <S%H247>up<s%> your <S%H2504>body<s%> now like a <S%H1397>man<s%>: I will <S%H7592>demand<s%> of <S%H3045>you<s%>, and declare you unto me.
Will you also <S%H6565>annul<s%> my <S%H4941>judgment<s%>? will you <S%H7561>condemn<s%> <S%H6663>me<s%>, that you may be righteous?
Have you a <S%H2220>arm<s%> like <S%H410>God<s%>? or can you <S%H7481>thunder<s%> with a voice like <S%H6963>him<s%>?
<S%H5710>Deck<s%> yourself now with <S%H1347>majesty<s%> and <S%H1363>excellency<s%>; and <S%H3847>array<s%> yourself with <S%H1935>glory<s%> and <S%H1926>beauty<s%>.
Cast <S%H6327>abroad<s%> the <S%H5678>rage<s%> of your <S%H639>wrath<s%>: and <S%H7200>behold<s%> every one that is <S%H1343>proud<s%>, and abase <S%H8213>him<s%>.
<S%H7200>Look<s%> on every one that is <S%H1343>proud<s%>, and bring him <S%H3665>low<s%>; and tread <S%H1915>down<s%> the wicked in their <S%H7563>place<s%>.
<S%H2934>Hide<s%> them in the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>; and <S%H2280>bind<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> in <S%H2934>secret<s%>.
Then will I also <S%H3034>confess<s%> unto you that your own right <S%H3225>hand<s%> can save <S%H3467>you<s%>.
Behold now <S%H930>behemoth<s%>, which I <S%H6213>made<s%> with <S%H398>you<s%>; he eats <S%H2682>grass<s%> as a <S%H1241>ox<s%>.
Behold <S%H3581>now<s%>, his strength is in his <S%H4975>body<s%>, and his <S%H202>force<s%> is in the <S%H8306>navel<s%> of his <S%H990>belly<s%>.
He <S%H2654>moves<s%> his <S%H2180>tail<s%> like a <S%H730>cedar<s%>: the <S%H1517>sinews<s%> of his <S%H6344>stones<s%> are wrapped <S%H8276>together<s%>.
His <S%H6106>bones<s%> are as <S%H650>strong<s%> pieces of <S%H5154>brass<s%>; his <S%H1634>bones<s%> are like <S%H4300>bars<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>.
He is the <S%H7225>chief<s%> of the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%>: he that <S%H6213>made<s%> him can <S%H5066>make<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%> to approach unto <S%H5066>him<s%>.
Surely the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> bring him <S%H5375>forth<s%> <S%H944>food<s%>, where all the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H7832>play<s%>.
He <S%H7901>lies<s%> under the shady <S%H6628>trees<s%>, in the <S%H5643>covert<s%> of the <S%H7070>reed<s%>, and <S%H1207>fens<s%>.
The shady <S%H6628>trees<s%> <S%H5526>cover<s%> him with their <S%H6752>shadow<s%>; the <S%H6155>willows<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook<s%> compass him <S%H5437>about<s%>.
<S%H6231>Behold<s%>, he drinks up a <S%H5104>river<s%>, and <S%H2648>hastens<s%> <S%H982>not<s%>: he trusts that he can draw <S%H1518>up<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> into his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
He <S%H3947>takes<s%> it with his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: his <S%H639>nose<s%> pierces <S%H5344>through<s%> <S%H4170>snares<s%>.
